description: This is an HTML file that implements the front-end interface for a database viewer application, providing UI components, styling, and embedded JavaScript for dynamic interactions with databases and tables.
external_files: <link> (none explicitly, but references to external CSS or JS generally)

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of databases and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the list of databases and resets selection.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses a database to show its tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches data for a selected table and renders it.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Generates HTML for table data display.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Renders individual cell content based on data type and length.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content that exceeds default display size or contains objects.
